location: St John's Park, Bernard Street, Sheffield, S2 5PU
description: Join us for our Sunday gathering every week at 10:45am. We gather to worship Jesus, hear the Bible read and explained, and to pray.
service_style: Our Sunday gathering is informal and interactive, with contemporary worship songs.
kids_blurb: We have Park Kids and Park Youth groups (0-14) that meet during our service.
after_service: Please join us for refreshments afterwards to hang out as church family.

image.alt: Worship team singing during a Sunday gathering

what_to_expect_items: Services are usually a little over one hour.
We sing together, read Scripture, hear Bible teaching, and pray.
On the first Sunday of each month, we share Communion.
talks_link_intro: Catch up on talks from previous Sundays on our
